protein.specific_function: Transport of phosphate groups from the cytosol to the mitochondrial matrix. Phosphate is cotransported with H(+). May play a role regulation of the mitochondrial permeability transition pore (mPTP).

go_class.description: generation of precursor metabolites and energy

reference.reference_text: Dolce V, Iacobazzi V, Palmieri F, Walker JE: The sequences of human and bovine genes of the phosphate carrier from mitochondria contain evidence of alternatively spliced forms. J Biol Chem. 1994 Apr 8;269(14):10451-60.
